author: Jamie Crawley
title: Chinese Marketing Company Aurora Mobile Plans to Adopt Crypto Treasury
description: The Shenzhen, China-based company's board has approved an initiative to convert up to 20% its cash and cash equivalents into BTC and other digital assets.
content:
Aurora Mobile (JG), a Nasdaq-listed marketing technology provider, is the latest publicly traded company to plan a treasury strategy that includes cryptocurrency investments.
